FuncDef: This command configures the time (in s), for LSP re-establishment attempts after it has failed. The retry time is jittered to +/- 25% of its nominal value.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the amount of time (in s), between attempts to re-establish the LSP after it has failed. Allowed values are integers in the range of 1 to 600. Values-1 to 600.
